posts.post_title: T207Herzog Cycle PSA Wilste Clark Batting
posts.post_content:
-T207 Herzog Yankees with Red Cycle Back. VGEX No wrinkles. Corner dings. SOLD

-T206 Wilste Fielding Piedmont 350 PSA 4 $59.00.

-T206 HOF'R Fred Clarke Batting Piedmont 150 VGEX $75.00.

Price includes SH&I. Will consider reasonable offers for individual cards, groups or all. Email me here or privately at [url]RBCraik@aol.com[/url].
Paypal OK at no additional cost.
Thanks & take a look at my Pre WWII & 20's stuff I have in BST this week!

Hi Bob,

I will take the Herzog.

Thanks  

Lee
